meanings.definition: Not based on random choice or personal whim
meanings.sent1: The rules in this game are nonarbitrary, they are set and cannot change.
meanings.sent2: The nonarbitrary decision was made by the committee after careful consideration.
meanings.sent3: It was a relief to have a nonarbitrary deadline for the project.
meanings.sent4: The nonarbitrary nature of the law ensured fairness for all citizens.
meanings.sent5: The nonarbitrary nature of the test questions made them easy to understand.

meanings.definition: Not subject to individual discretion or preference
meanings.sent1: The company has a nonarbitrary policy regarding employee benefits.
meanings.sent2: The nonarbitrary rules apply equally to all students in the school.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see how the nonarbitrary dress code caused confusion among the staff.
meanings.sent4: The nonarbitrary nature of the decision left no room for personal bias.
meanings.sent5: The nonarbitrary nature of the weather forecast surprised everyone.
